thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Brighthouse Financial Announces Effectiveness Of S-4 Registration Statement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Brighthouse Financial Announces Effectiveness Of S-4 Registration Statement
text:
March 28 (Reuters) - Brighthouse Financial Inc:
* BRIGHTHOUSE FINANCIAL ANNOUNCES EFFECTIVENESS OF S-4 REGISTRATION STATEMENT AND LAUNCH OF DEBT EXCHANGE OFFER FOR UP TO $1.5 BILLION OF ITS 3.700% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2027 AND UP TO $1.5 BILLION OF ITS 4.700% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2047
* BRIGHTHOUSE FINANCIAL INC - EFFECTIVE MARCH 28, 2018, IT WILL LAUNCH ITS OFFER TO EXCHANGE ITS OLD NOTES FOR ITS NEW NOTES
* BRIGHTHOUSE FINANCIAL INC - OFFER FOR OLD NOTES WILL EXPIRE AT 5:00 P.M. NEW YORK CITY TIME ON APRIL 25, 2018, UNLESS OTHERWISE EXTENDED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
